name: French Fries Food Fest Kids Cooking Game
name_original: French Fries Food Fest Kids Cooking Game
description:
Do you love street foods? Are you want to change the taste ? You want to eat tasty food? Here we are presenting a special kids cooking game to make delicious street foods and it’s French Fries Maker. Hey little crazy chef come and make some crispy hot delicious French fries in your own kitchen with this free fun addictive girls cooking game.Kids who love to enjoy French fries and fast food come on and be a crazy chef and make a high quality crispy fries for your friends and family. Because they love delicious fast food so play with their appetite by cooking delicious fries.

HOW TO MAKE IT:
First of all wash the potato and then cut it. Put them in the frying pan or frying machine, when fried decorate your delicious fast food with toppings, tomato ketchup and other decorative items. Serve your creation with delicious side orders and have fun.

FEATURES:
1.Learn to make a delicious french fries.
2.French-Fries Maker can be a best game for your child.
3.With best control,you will feel originally preparing French-Fries.
4.Share option with all social media.
5.Beautiful sounds and live environment.
